title: Camila Cabello & Shawn Mendes Apparently Under Attack As Rapper Drops Racism Accusation
text:
Thanks for signing up!

Chicago rapper Cupcakke has gone on a wild rant calling out a famous pop singer who she believes to be racist and punters reckon she’s referring to one Camila Cabello.

The rapper began her rant by pointing out that said racist singer used to be in a popular girl group.

“Your ‘fav’ that use to be in that lil pop group is racist but WBK,” she wrote, leading fans to assume that it’s the ex Fifth Harmony singer.

Your “fav” that use to be in that lil pop group is racist but WBK — Marilyn MonHOE (@CupcakKe_rapper) September 21, 2019

She went on to add that the singer she is referring to is dating “the fine gay guy.”

Camila Cabello has been dating singer Shawn Mendes for quite some time now and sadly fans have been flooding social media with rumours about his sexuality which is another clue.

The one that’s dating the fine gay guy https://t.co/Akjrfax3Ib — Marilyn MonHOE (@CupcakKe_rapper) September 21, 2019

She concludes her rant by alleging that she slept with the singer’s boyfriend as payback for her alleged racism, although she doesn’t clarify whether it’s the “fine gay guy” or another boyfriend.

“Yes sis …. I fucked your man … & I did it on purpose since your racist& that’s the TEA,” she wrote.

“Let’s tell the world become I grab the receipts.”

Yes sis …. I fucked your man … & I did it on purpose since your racist ???? & that’s the TEA ‼️ let’s tell the world become I grab the receipts — Marilyn MonHOE (@CupcakKe_rapper) September 21, 2019

The rapper’s rant quickly went viral and punters have immediately assumed that she’s referring to Cabello who has previously apologised for penning racist tweets.

y’all telling me cupcakke had sex with shawn mendes and publicly called camila cabello racist and said shawn mendes dick small… i love twitter pic.twitter.com/mtzznEPf6p — taes baby mama | jb follows! (@integritae) September 22, 2019

So Cupcakke pegged Shawn Mendez to punish Camila Cabello for being racist? pic.twitter.com/q4dw8dQYS3 — ????????Hot Girl MidSommar???????? (@Faggatronics) September 22, 2019

WAIT…Cupcakke and Shawn did what?… Camila Cabello's a what?… A baby tooth is the size of Shawns what?… pic.twitter.com/y0Ud2eqt9k — JES (@Jeesseessee) September 22, 2019

Fans seem to think that rapper CupcakKe is throwing jabs at Camila Cabello & Shawn Mendes in recent tweets. ???? pic.twitter.com/QT9THHukpe — The Pop Hub (@ThePopHub) September 21, 2019

Why the hell did I just wake up to cupcakKe talking about how she fucked Shawn mendas because Camila cabello is racist ???? pic.twitter.com/YBAGP1ObHW — ????ᴸᴬᵞᴸᴬᴴ???? (@SparklingVante) September 22, 2019

Camila Cabello ain’t even apologizing for callin her band members hard racial slurs so cupcakke (yes, the rapper) fucked Shawn Mendes to get back at Camila Cabello for being racist And no I’m not joking ALSO CUPCAKKE CALLED SHAWN PENIS SMAL OMFG IM DYINGGGGGG https://t.co/rPF22fF41D — نیکو (@wildestmoney) September 22, 2019

As seen in the below tweets, Cabello previously apologised after racist tweets from before she was famous circulated online.

In the alleged tweets, Cabello used the ‘n’ word as well as racist language like “hood rat” but later apologised in 2013, writing:

“I get how anybody that doesn’t know me would think those things about me, I was immature and young and joking (not an excuse) but I apologise.”
description: Rapper Cupcakke has gone on a rant about a singer she believes to be racist and her gay boyfriend and fans think it's Camila Cabello and Shawn Mendes.
